summary: A mod that replaces the original main menu song with X-ray Dog - Giant Slayer No Mercy.
descriptionHtml:
This \"mod\" replaces the original main menu song with X-ray Dog - Giant Slayer no mercy.
I suggest you to use this with
Main Menu wallpaper replacer HD 1080p now with randomizer
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3708
as it gives it more epicness.

X-Ray Dog is the owner of the song, I only converted it to the format Skyrim uses.
author: Blure Shadow
